string-array.name: paypalinstruction
string-array.item: Buy or sell around the globe.We process and convert 26 currencies from 203 markets to make spending and selling simple and secure
PayPal offers you availability, convenience, and security.
Run your online business without fear of online fraud and theft. PayPal comes through offering superb security and fraud protection for both consumers and merchant.
We monitor transactions 24/7. So rest easy — even when you let your guard down, we won’t.
If there’s a problem with a transaction, we’ll put a hold on the funds until the issue is resolved. We investigate and stay involved every step of the way.
Click the link below to get started.
